org.datavec.dataframe.util

Class TestDb

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.datavec.dataframe.util.TestDb

  • public class TestDb
extends java.lang.Object
    Test database using JavaDB (aka Derby) to createFromCsv result sets to convert to tables Note: because it requires a Derby driver be installed, It is not intended to be used in normal (unit) tests Derived mainly from a tutorial by:
